# url

**Type Property**

A parse strategy for URLs.

## Declaration

```swift
static var url: URL.ParseStrategy { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the dot-notation form of this type property when the call point allows the use of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL/ParseStrategy]. Typically, you use this with the URL initializer [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL/init(_:strategy:)].

## Commonly-used parsers

- **fixed(format:timeZone:locale:)**: A fixed-format date parse strategy.
- **name**: A parse strategy for person name components.

items.description: A parse strategy for person name components.
items.name: name

title: url
